Go进阶45:Golang-logrus简单的日志收集系统(替代ELKB)

11

  • 111
  • 222


-[x] sss

package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "time"
)

func main() {
    now := time.Now()
    fmt.Println(now)
    later := now.Add(time.Minute)
    fmt.Println(later)
}
